review.reviewBody: Asked the restaurant to do a dhaba tadka on the shahi paneer and it was so good! I was just craving a shahi paneer from a dhaba at 1 am and they fulfilled it. Just loved it, thank you so much!
Didn't like the taste at all...It was not properly cooked and prepared

The chicken tikka was super salty and dry. I could only eat 1 piece snd it was very clear from the first mouthful that I'm literally eating salt. 
The fish pakora was delicious. The batter was light and crispy. The fish itself was fluffy and well seasoned. 
The waiting time for the order was beyond unreasonable. The app told me it will be 23 minutes to pick up. I went there with 10 minutes to spare. As I arrived, the lady at the restaurant told me it'll actually be 20 mins. 20 mins later she told me it'll be another 5 mins. I allowed additional 5 mins (so, 10 mins total, on top of the 20), and my food was still not ready. Another 3 minutes later the guy brings me the food and hands it to me, no 'sorry for the long wait' no nothing. I will not be ordering from there again. Fact.
pizza not cooked all the way...wrong sauce, didnt switch the toppings
Veggie pizza was not good at all
